input_args.passage: 'Mitchell, Elizabeth | Maine | “Libby” Mitchell was born in South Carolina, but her hometown is Vassalboro. She attended Furman University for her B.A.; University of North Carolina at Chapel ...'
input_args.claim: 'She was also the Speaker of the Maine House of Representatives and President of the Maine Senate from 2008 to 2010, making her the first woman in the United States to have held both positions, and the third person ever to do so.'
